## About

Takes a callback and fires it when a condition is true

[//]: # "Main"

## Installation

    npm install --save @rooks/use-timeout-when

## Importing the hook

```javascript
import useTimeoutWhen from "@rooks/use-timeout-when"
```

## Usage

```jsx
function Demo() {
  useTimeoutWhen(cb, 1000);
  return null
}

render(<Demo/>)
```
